website_summaries.verdict: Set is similar to others, but is edged out by its unbeatable quality.
pros: Has engraved measurement marks that resist fading
cons: The metal portion of the handles feels flimsy and bendable

customer_reviews.title: Alright, but you could do better.
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly good measuring cups with only a few flaws. First, the weld joints between the cup and handle seems like a likely spot for rust to start forming. The rubber grip handles fit comfortably in the hand, but if the cup is full of flour (1 cup), it's almost too much weight and the metal begins to bend slightly. The edges around the teaspoons is rough and unfinished on some of the spoons. The set is alright for the price, but I would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: C.Graham

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, sturdy, well made, NOte - holes too small for anything other than the ring that comes with the set
customer_reviews.text: Well made, Adorable. Love the color. My only criticism is that the holes are too small for anything other than the ring that comes with the cups and spoons, It would be nice to have a larger hole so that alternate options for hanging could be utilized. I like to use a caribiner for my cups - it releases more easily - but the holes are too small. Also you cant then hang the cups separately if that;s what you want to do as standard hooks won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Polaneczky

customer_reviews.title: Complete Set and Nestable!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for...a complete matched set. My previous measuring set was a hob knob of pieces I have had over the years. Seems like a silly thing, but its nice having the entire set. Lastly, I agree with some off the other viewers, the "rings" that are attached to the two sets (cups and spoons) are a little tight. A slightly larger hole on each item would allow them to move a little more freely. SMALL issue. I'll either fix it, or live with it. NOT a drop dead issue. Would definitely recommend this as a stocking stuffer gift for a newlywed or a friend that bakes a lot.
customer_reviews.author: csdrbrg

customer_reviews.title: A good weight
customer_reviews.text: These look good and feel good and are a good weight. Each set comes on a ring, which is good, but the silicone grips make using them while they're on their ring difficult. The grips also keep them from nesting well for storage. You pretty much need to store them nested with the handles splayed out (as in the picture of the nested cups). Other than that, they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of kitchen tools
customer_reviews.text: Great set of kitchen tools. Easy to read, easy to grip, easy to stack. Handles not quite as sturdy as I might have expected; feels like might bend a little when scooping out thick items (peanut butter, raisins, etc). Overall, I am very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Much better than plastic!  Nice handles !
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo much better than the plastic cheap ones I had. Love the fact they are stainless steel, wash up nicely. Don't care much for the detachable ring to keep them together. Which is nice you can remove it. But it is nice having the ring for the measuring spoons to keep them all together. They wash nice in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Because of the rubber on the handles they don’t nest flat within each other. I will have to teach my family to turn each handle to the side as shown in the seller’s pictures so it doesn’t get jammed in my drawers. Now they will take up unneccesary extra space. Would return if it didn’t cost 1/3 the price of the item.
customer_reviews.author: amazonmom

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: The measuring cups and spoons are very comfortable to hold and use. And I can read the amounts on every piece.
customer_reviews.author: Gma 5

customer_reviews.title: Great product, still in good shape 1.5 years later
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when I moved to a house with literally zero kitchen supplies and I still use them regularly over a year later. They've done fine in the dishwasher...my only complaint is that the edge of the tablespoon got a little sharp, but its not really a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nina R.

customer_reviews.title: i have had these measuring cup for about a year ...
customer_reviews.text: i have had these measuring cup for about a year know and so far i have no complicates about it. the rubber plastic that is the handle has not given up nor signs that its about to give up they are still going strong. On the price side it was a little high, but at the end of the day it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I use them everyday and they’ve still held up perfectly. We hand wash them and dry them to extend the use of these. Not sure how it would hold up if placed in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice set!
customer_reviews.text: These are accurate, colorful and easily stored together. I expected a heavier weight and shiny stainless steel but they function.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Handle With Care
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The metal on these cups is so thin that they go out of round pretty easily. My 1 Cup had to be thrown away because the wall of the cup actually split. Yes, it took an impact, but spend more money and get a sturdier product. You'll be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: David Cichon

customer_reviews.title: Measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exactly what I was looking for. Working properly. Fit together with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon mcdonough

customer_reviews.title: Not stamped correctly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very excited to receive this set, then she noticed that the cup and half-cup are both stamped as a full cup. (See photo). They seem to be heavy duty, but having mislabeled measuring cups kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these! They work great and I have had ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! They work great and I have had no issue with rusting even after multiple washes in a dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection of sizes
customer_reviews.text: Pleased to have matching measuring cups and spoons. All the sizes I need. Love the color

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality measuring cups. Very sturdy and strong. Does not rust. I've been using these for over a year now and they still look,new.

customer_reviews.title: Love these cups/spoons
customer_reviews.text: Just use these cups and spoons to make my banana/eggnog bread. Love them.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: purchased these Chef U Measuring Cups and Spoons set while ago and I just love them. very easy to use especially I need to measure my food and there are excellent. the quality are fantastic and easy to wash.

customer_reviews.title: Good item. Bad delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Item great!!! Delivery awful. Box left by front door even though I was home. Delivery instructions not followed.

customer_reviews.title: The greatest additions to my kitchen in a long time
customer_reviews.text: The greatest additions to my kitchen in a long time! Easy to use, easy to read...what more could a guy ask for in a set of measuring cups/spoons?

customer_reviews.title: Cooking
customer_reviews.text: Love my measuring cups and spoons. They are just right

customer_reviews.text: Super nice set of measuring cups and spoons. I love having a stainless set I can use with hot food.

customer_reviews.text: They are nice, however they bend quite a bit at the connecting point of the handle and the cup itself.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: So far a good product. One of the measuring spoons does have ...
customer_reviews.text: So far a good product. One of the measuring spoons does have sharp edge on it. I feel I did pay more for this set than I should have. Only time will tell how well this set is.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The 1/4 cup stamp is very light, not stamped very deeply stamped into the steel.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't tell you if these are exact measurement but they don't stain and the rubber on the handles do not break down in the dishwasher.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These not only look good, but feel good in the hands, non-slip when hands are wet. Love the orange too!

customer_reviews.title: Caution!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these. Used it once and washed...already has rust.

customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipment with items exactly as described. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is very good! I would like if the stamped sizes were a little more pronounced and a little larger on the measuring spoons.

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: Love the ring that keeps them together & handy. Nice quality.

customer_reviews.title: There sturdy enough, I like them
customer_reviews.text: My wife says the cups are to heavy. There sturdy enough ,I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price for the set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality stainless steel measuring cups and spoons are heavy enough to stand up to daily use. Sure-grip handles make for easy use even with oil. Handles are silicone and clean up easily. Both sets come with large ring for organizing in drawer or cupboard and can also hang on a hook. Orange color matches mixing bowl set I received as a gift. The measurements stamped on the cups are easy to read, but should be larger on the spoons. Recommend for all levels of use from home kitchen to professional chef.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B.

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact they are made out of metal instead ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact they are made out of metal instead of plastic. They have all the sizes you would need
customer_reviews.author: Frank F.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the metal is thin and feels a bit unfinished. I don't think this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Kitchen!! It's fancy and is easy to handle! The package arrived on time and was well packed!! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like these. They are sturdy and made well
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They are sturdy and made well. The measuring spoons are very accurate. Love the 1/8 cup and 1/2 tablespoon measurers. Easy to clean - so far I haven't had any issues with food getting into the handles as others have described. I wash them in the dishwasher and so far I've had no problems with rusting either. Overall really great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Dennis

customer_reviews.title: after 5 months cracked and rusty!
customer_reviews.text: so disappointed! cracked abd Rusty!!! i bake on occassion so i dont use these every day so i was VERY surprised to find my one cup measuring cup cracked!!!! how did this happen?! the cups and spoons are lightweight too light, the spoons bend when getting ingedients measured!!! Also RUST appeared so fast , these are not good IMO. now i have to see if my set can be replaced, i will update this review after i conyact them.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: measuring spoons are stamped with wrong size. teaspoon marked 1/2 tsp. , 1/2 tsp. marked 1 tsp.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJames  Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Looks over function
customer_reviews.text: The measuring cups rusted and bent with minimal normal use. Poor quality. Too bad, they are very cute and the handles feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Schultz

customer_reviews.title: ... starting i haven't used these yet but am very happy so far with the quality they seem very sturdy ...
customer_reviews.text: bought these for a mobile food truck im starting i haven't used these yet but am very happy so far with the quality they seem very sturdy and i love the orange
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I use these whenever I cook or bake. They are sturdy, easy to level and are fantastic at scooping. Also, the inside of the cups/spoons is very well polished which allows most of the items (except for the stickiest ones) to come right out. This also makes washing them rather easy. Lastly, they stack and store easily. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They're incredibly sturdy and made of high-quality materials, so hopefully I won't need to buy another set ever again. The handles are coated with silicone, so they're very easy to grip, and also don't get hot it you're holding them over a glass stove. I can mix ingredients right in the cups before adding them to whatever I'm making, and although the spoons are round they're deep and small enough to fit in practically any spice jar. The stainless steel makes them all easy to clean and they're dishwasher safe too.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Serena 💚Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Between my boyfriend and me, we had a sad collection of measuring cups and spoons. All were plastic, a few were missing, and many had battle wounds from garbage disposals and stove tops. So, a nice "grown-up" set has been in the back of my mind for a while. I knew I wanted metal, but what I like about these is the little added bonus of squishy silicone. Not only does this add a little cushion, I like that they have some color, which wasn't an attribute I was looking for originally. I've been using them long enough to be able to say they are cute, sturdy and amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Why the narrow slot openings?
customer_reviews.text: The photo on Amazon shows these measuring cups as having some kind of ring for hanging them. I got both the measuring cups & measuring spoons & neither came with the ring. The holes on the handles are very narrow slots, so they don't fit on the hooks in my kitchen. I had to jury-rig a couple zip-ties into the narrow slots so I could hang them up. Now I have to use the whole cluster whenever I'm cooking with or washing these utensils. Not very well engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Roderick

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and they do the job. Love the green ones I ordered — kind of a minty neon green. Gave this four stars only because the silicone on one of the measuring cups is “dented”, but it’s not a big deal and nobody would notice but me probably. Didn’t even warrant me returning the item. Some reviews state that these are not sturdy enough. Well, unless you are going to use them to dig a hole in your backyard for your new swimming pool, they are really quite functional and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hope to Help

customer_reviews.title: They're Measuring Cups
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here. They're measuring cups. Would've given more stars but the handles don't seem very sturdy. The silicone inserts don't account for much either. They'll do but I always apply my hand to the bottom of the cup when scooping something like brown sugar otherwise the handle will surely bend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. They don't bend or melt, with I would have bought them years ago. highly recommend these metal over the plastic or silicone. There were some other reviews that said the silicone inserts fall out. I have had them for two months and have not experience that.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mae

customer_reviews.title: New cups and spoons - how liberating!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend didn't agree that we should toss our old plastic measuring cups and spoons that were going on 6-7 years. He now admits he was wrong! It's lovely to have a full matching set that is not warped. The gripped handles are great and make them easier to use while cooking. Would buy again, very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Julia H

customer_reviews.title: Came with 2 1tsp and no 1/2 tsp
customer_reviews.text: I received my product with the 1/2 tsp measuring spoon missing and instead had 2 of the 1 tsp measuring spoons. It’s increidbly annoying. Can’t even return because i have already used other spoons before realizing.
customer_reviews.author: Brutallyhonest

customer_reviews.title: So cute easy to store and clean
customer_reviews.text: I like the metal cup I always used plastic but this is much better i like the red color they stack and store great very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dinky

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and functional however they are made a little cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hilburn

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a birthday gift for my sister. She was so tired of the measurements fading off the plastic cups she used. She absolutely LOVES these cups and says they are the best quality of any she has used in over 20 years. She is now going to order ither products in your line. I am ordering for myself as well.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Wilson

customer_reviews.title: You will be pleasantly pleased...
customer_reviews.text: Nice nesting set of cups and spoons...like the feel of the green grips. Measurements east to read. Heavy weight and will stand up to years of daily use. I don't put them in a dishwasher though....but they are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: LwosTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: So I loved these bc they were pink, however, they rust and I hand wash them and I just noticed that one of the cups has a crack. Please see picture!!
customer_reviews.author: Cussin Irish

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and nicely made. Easy to handle and hold. Although I have not put them in the dishwasher, these wash well by hand. They are also easy to store. Love that you get both the measuring and cups and spoons. A great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Keni

customer_reviews.title: A solid measuring cup set.
customer_reviews.text: These are great and durable. They've been in use regularly for 6 months and possibly for the next 20 years. The edges are a little sharp at first.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Vansteinburg

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Attractive and Handy
customer_reviews.text: I find these solid and easy to use. They are a good weight and I like the colorful easily gripped handles. The only thing I miss is the convenience of a 3/4 cup measure.
customer_reviews.author: little old lady

customer_reviews.title: They are NOT hooked together!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as the picture made it look as it they were linked together. Beware that they are not--they come individually. Otherwise it is a pretty and sturdy set.
customer_reviews.author: DC-3Gal

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The best part of these units is that the sizing is stamped into the stainless steel. The second best part is that they are stainless steel. Rinse and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Love this measuring cup set
customer_reviews.text: Love this measuring cup set! Mostly because I just love the teal color but it's a great set. Love that it has 1/8 cup included. That's not very common.
customer_reviews.author: tjhalley

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Measuring
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and heavy and should last. I was tired of the cheap sets painted numbers coming off and having to guess which cup or spoon I grabbed.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not likely to last long
customer_reviews.text: Cute set but also very lightweight for the money. I don’t think the measuring cups will last long.

customer_reviews.text: High quality measuring cups and spoons. Solid structure to them and will not rust. I feel like a professional now. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my college son. He specifically requested these particular ones, and he loves them. He is a serious bodybuilder, and all of his food has to be weighed out in exact measures. So, very pleased with the purchase. Now go dance in public!

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Chef U products.
customer_reviews.text: Product just as described and I love that they match my Chef U bowls!! The stainless steel makes is so easy to clean.

customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a Christmas gift. So they haven't been used yet, they are super cute and heavy so I hope they turn out perfect! Ships fast!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set. Love the ring to keep them attached
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Love the ring to keep them attached.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely outstanding. The measurements are etched into the metal, and the handles are riveted onto the metal for more durability. Very good product
customer_reviews.author: Sagrill

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and high quality. I love the handles and the clip they are on.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfBoys3

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they could be.
customer_reviews.text: Very excited when I ordered these to have a wide variety of measurments in both the cups and spoons. When I opened the package I realized they weren't very sturdy. They bend easily and the silicone handles have started to pop out and/or move when pressure if applied, like when you scoop out butter from a container. I have already had to throw away the 'cup' measuring cup because the handle broke off. Really was hoping to have a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya N Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using for my weight loss journey ! Helps with portion control
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of use, the measuring cups are holding up, but the measuring spoons have developed quite a bit of rust. The rust is on the split ring as well as the spoons themselves. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Chapell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The ring rusted the first time I washed it so I tossed it. One by one the measuring cups are following suit and getting rusty. Very bad quality. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dorcas wachira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I only wish there was an 1/8 tsp but thats my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Phelps

customer_reviews.title: These don't deserve the 5 star ratings that people keep giving them.
customer_reviews.text: This product is far from "Premium Quality" with a "Sturdy Build". The handle bends when scooping flour or sugar, the silicon handle is cheap and poorly fitting, and the handles have sharp edges that hurt to hold. For 1/3 of the price I can get a more comfortable, more robust, and more aesthetically pleasing set of measuring cups and spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Kendalls

product_meta.title: Measuring Cups and Measuring Spoons set by Chef U | Stainless Steel Measuring Cups and Spoons Set of 10 | Liquid Measuring Cup or Dry Measuring Cup Set | Stainless Measuring Cups | Nesting (Teal)
product_meta.description:
Not all measuring cups and spoons are alike, Chef U brings to you a set of premium quality measuring cups and spoons that go great with any modern and stylish kitchen. 

CHEF U Measuring Cups and Spoons 

This set offers you many incredible benefits over other similar products available in the market: 

✔ Engraved Measurement Markings - do not fade, wash off or wear out like printed ones 
✔ Superior Quality Stainless Steel - Rust Proof 
✔ Lightweight yet Sturdy and Durable 
✔ Food grade vibrant color silicone which offers firm grip and stylish look 
✔ Precision engineering to ensure accurate measurements
